#  Level 1 overview{#xlevel1}

In the pages in this section you will learn how to get started with Causal Map: what kind of device you need, how to access Causal Map for free, and finding your way around the app.

When you've read the pages, try the [quiz](https://causalmap.shinyapps.io/quizzes/#section-xlevel1) to see if you have understood enough or need to review some!
